Address: 4 Corio Bay Court Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Stunning Lifestyle Property
Exquisitely presented throughout, this outstanding home provides luxurious family living is perfectly located within an exclusive cul-de-sac which is part of the exclusive High Ridge Estate.
Set privately within a lush garden setting, the stunning home offers a light filled, flowing floor-plan with a combination of garden & bay vistas. Presented in perfect order throughout the home includes a powder room, generous formal lounge & dining room leading to an expansive open plan family/meals area with a well appointed kitchen featuring beautiful granite bench tops & European appliances. The centre piece of the home is a fully enclosed indoor heated pool (12m x 3m) perfect for relaxation & entertaining. Complemented by 3 bedrooms, with the Master bedroom having walk in robes & a fully renovated ensuite. Also with a 4th bedroom/study with amazing views of the gardens, the bay & beyond.
The original garage has been turned into a studio room that would be the envy of those who are artistically inclined. Set off to the side of the home is a four bay garage perfect for a small home business or storage for all of your lifestyle toys.
This superbly presented family home is located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, a short stroll to public transport, excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private & access to the Bellarine Peninsulas world class restaurants & wineries - all of which enhances the lifestyle appeal of this prestigious location. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.
Land size: 3800sqm approx.
Insights: 4 Corio Bay Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
ROCK SOLID LIFESTYLE
That is right, take one look at this location and it is all here, the beach, the fishing, the golf, the wineries, the shopping, the schools, you name it, it is only 5 minutes away.
This 3 bedroom home located in a quiet area of Clifton Springs, yet only 5 minutes walk to the golf club and beach, it abounds with charm and character, start with a warm and inviting lounge area with a bay window, gas log fire, new carpets and flooring throughout. New double glazed windows in each of the bedrooms, and a generous dining and kitchen area, from there you open up onto the north facing outdoor area where you can sit and admire the view across the bay to the You Yangs. A large laundry, full ensuite, double garage, side access and country style kitchen all add up to making this property a rock solid lifestyle home or an investment into your future.
Insights: 8 Bambra Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Sea Side Cottage on the Beautiful Bellarine!!
Have you been dreaming of a sea change? Now is your chance to secure a prime location in the real estate hot spot of Clifton Springs. Only moments to the foreshore, this cozy 2 bedroom cottage is sure to impress. Situated on a 585m2 block the opportunities are endless. Downsizers, investors, developers, or first home buyers will appreciate all this home has to offer.
The downstairs light filled open plan living area looks over the fully renovated kitchen with stainless steel cooking gas appliances, stone bench tops and dishwasher.
Split system heating and cooling for added comfort and video surveillance with intercom for extra security. The large bathroom with frameless shower screen and tiled shower base also combines with the laundry.
Make your way upstairs to two bedrooms, both with water views and built in robes with hanging space and shelving.
For a relaxing afternoon outdoors, the home has a decked verandah at the rear looking over the large yard. There is also a separate bungalow that could be used for extra sleeping quarters or a games room.
Safe and secure car space adds extra security to the backyard.
Don't miss out on this one!!
Insights: 74 Mirrabooka Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Deep Blue Panoramic Water Views
The Facts (In Short):
-Outstanding panoramic water views; breathtaking sunsets and the dazzling lights of the Geelong CBD.
-A quality build of absolutely no compromise offering luxury rarely seen in today's property market; stunning timber floors, high ceilings with decorative cornices, European appliances, expansive night sky granite bench tops, embossed designer carpet and a slow combustion fireplace.
-A contemporary floor plan; expansive upstairs open plan living captures the amazing view aspect.
-A timeless kitchen is true to its federation style; crisp white finishes provide an eye catching contrast against night sky granite benches. European appliances, an integrated dishwasher and great storage solutions complete the picture.
-X3 oversized bedroom suites plus an additional study (living area); the master bedroom complete with ensuite and walk in robe.
-X3 car garage with a toilet and powder room; under-house storage as far as the eye can see - enough room for all the tools and a wine cellar if you desire.
-Beautifully landscaped gardens; a dedicated brief of low maintenance is blended with delightfully productive fruit trees to the rear to create a private oasis.
-An additional fully equipped alfresco; complete with cafe blinds, BBQ, range hood and an outdoor sink provide a lovely private and sheltered place to entertain your guests.
-A spare no expense build is complete with all the modern comforts to make this home not only spectacular but comfortable all year round.
A truly wonderful and limited opportunity to secure your very own piece of blue chip real estate on the Bellarine Peninsula. Phone today and you can proudly call all this and more your very own 'home'.
Insights: 19 Narawi Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A serene family home.
Here is a fantastic chance to purchase a beautiful family home in the ever so serene, Clifton Springs. This home is oozing with warmth, comfort and abundance in space, making this a perfect first home, investment or dream home with great scope to renovate and extend (STCA). Comprising of 4 well-sized bedrooms, one complimented with a walk-in robe and ensuite, a kitchen overlooking the dining area, boasting plenty of natural light, two living rooms, another central bathroom and all of this accompanied by polished floorboards visible throughout the majority of the home. At the rear of this 916m2 approx. allotment stands the rear balcony overlooking the expansive yard and the eye-catching, conserved bushland beyond. Located in a quiet street you're just a 15 minute walk to the beach and also close to schools, public transport and the local shopping village. It's very rare for a property to come up of this calibre, with so much scope, so be sure to enquire hastily.
Insights: 6 Dederang Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Come Join Us On The Bellarine!
Located in a very quiet part of Clifton Springs is this 3 bedroom home set on a large 618m2 (approx.) parcel of land. A beautifully tiled hallway leads to an open plan living, meals and kitchen with gas top cooking and electric oven, as well as a dishwasher and breakfast bar. Featuring full ensuite to the main bedroom and built in wardrobes to the others. Reverse cycle split system to keep you cool in the summer and warm in the winter. Remote control garage door with internal access into the home for convenience. This lovely property is situated close to the bay beach and boat ramp. Handy to the golf club for the golfer of the family and only minutes away from shops, medical centre and all the Bellarine has to offer.

Description:
Incredible Views for Lifestyle Living
Set high on the hill, with sweeping bay views, this two storey, three bedroom solid brick family home offers plenty of room for lifestyle living with every amenity at your fingertips. Shops are a short stroll away and the boat ramp is nearby. A generous entryway with private balcony leads to the kitchen and breakfast dining space, and through to a large living and dining area taking in wide views of the You Yangs and shipping traffic across the bay. The recently updated balcony is perfect for al fresco dining and overlooks the pool and established garden. Imagine a morning coffee on the deck with the papers, and seeing the ships sail past to Geelong!
Bedrooms all have BIRs and the master has ensuite with shared toilet. Together with the family bathroom, the bedrooms located on the top floor for easy living. Downstairs, a large rumpus room with built in bar, second toilet and cellar/storage is an ideal family room, with easy access to the garden and pool area. The study has a lovely garden outlook and captures views of the water. The swimming pool and deck area is a great addition to the garden that also includes established vegetable beds and native planting.
Further highlights include gas ducted heating, SLUG, workshop, tank and under house storage together with a carport roller door offering privacy. Add your personal touches to create the perfect coastal hideaway.
- Incredible sweeping views of the bay and You Yangs
- Solid two storey family home offers chance to update
- Three bedrooms, all with BIRS and a master with ensuite
- Newly installed pool and deck offers real lifestyle living
- Schools, shopping, golf club and further amenities all nearby
- Gas ducted heating, SLUG workshop and tank.
Insights: 71 Parrakoola Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Immaculate Home- On 759m2!
You won't need to worry about a thing when you move into this absolutely immaculate 3 bedroom home set on a fantastic 759m2 allotment. Get the golf clubs out or head off to one of the many wineries virtually on your doorstep and just relax! The home offers buyers a well equipped kitchen with almost new appliances plus adjoining meals area. The separate lounge and formal dining space- that currently doubles as a study- is kept cosy by the solid fuel heating and overlooks the gardens. The master bedroom is complimented by a full ensuite & WIR. Both minor bedrooms also have robes. Storage through-out the home is great. Polished floorboards, central gas heating, modern bathroom & ensuite are just a few of this property's many features. For the man of the home there is ample car accommodation and workshop space. Side access allows for boat or caravan storage. Make the time to inspect this delightful property as it won't be on the market long.

Description:
Unique Opportunity Calling All Investors!
Clifton Springs has become quite the growth corridor, being very popular amongst investors all wanting a piece of the Bellarine before prices skyrocket.
On offer are 2 townhouses, equipped with fantastic tenants, in a premium Clifton Springs location, well kept, well priced and awaiting your portfolio.
These townhouses are architecturally designed with no expenses spared on the quality fitout, now 6 years old and presenting fantastically.
Split over 2 free flowing levels you will feel right at home in the light filled and airy surroundings. Upon the ground level you will find 2 bedrooms both with built-in robes, main bathroom with shower & bath, powder room and an ample sized laundry room including storage cupboard completes the ground level. The timber staircase will lead you to a light filled first floor where you will find a large master suite with walk-in robe and full ensuite. The designer kitchen with caesarstone benchtops, pantry, gas cooktop and stainless steel appliances overlooking an expansive living/dining area surrounded by windows, bay views and leading onto the balcony.
Features of the townhouses include stone benchtops, bamboo flooring, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, gas ducted heating, split system heating/cooling, roller blinds, separate titles, under stairs storage and additional outdoor storage, double lock up garage with remote entry, internal/external access and exposed aggregate path and driveway with a clean and low maintenance street appeal.
Located in a fantastic part of Clifton Springs only minutes to all amenities, the Bay and what the Bellarine has to offer.
A fantastic opportunity for an investor with:
1/42 rented at $1694.65 PCM and leased until the 17/06/2018
2/42 (long term tenant) leased at $375 PW until the 01/08/2018
Alternatively you can secure a move in date towards the middle of the year.
Insights: 1/42 Coolangatta Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Cool Summer Breezes!
The Facts (In Short):
-Immaculately presented home boasting an abundance of natural light
-3 genuine double bedrooms (master complete with ensuite and a walk in robe)
-A stunning example of an open plan living
-A tranquil courtyard with a lovely orientation; low maintenance landscaped gardens
-Set within a highly desirable pocket of Clifton Springs; various parklands virtually at your door step
The Features:
I can say with absolute confidence this property is one of the most immaculately presented homes in today's property market. Upon entry it is evident that the proud homeowner has loved and adored this charming property. A clever floor plan provides independent living quarters; the overly generous master bedroom is set forward on the plan with the additional 2 bedrooms offering a guest wing with easy access to the family bathroom. A hub of the home is a stunning open plan living area; glass sliding doors provide a seamless connection to a truly tranquil courtyard. The courtyard is perfectly orientated to capture 'cool summer breezes' while you enjoy a glass of your favourite (complete with cafe blinds). A feature of this property is an abundance of natural light and crisp neutral finishes which enhance the light and bright 'feel'; various windows perfectly frame beautiful low maintenance landscaped gardens. All the modern comforts including ducted heating and split system air conditioner ensure all year round comfort for the lucky incoming purchaser. x6 solar panels further endorse this home as not only eye catching but it also embraces energy efficiency.
Insights: 38 Delungra Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 48 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Space, Style & Substance
Space, style and substance unite in this fabulously updated family home. Set on 724m2 (approx.), revelling in the peace and privacy provided by mature gums, in a quiet pocket wrapped by Clifton Springs Golf course. Surrounded by low maintenance native gardens, and an enviable outdoor play area for the kids, you’ll discover a thoughtful and private floorplan for a family to spread out - in absolute comfort.
- Elevated 724m2 (approx.) block, with sought after north facing entertaining and native gardens
- Enjoy all year sun beneath the beautifully crafted undercover alfresco, whilst kids play in the cubby
- Quality renovation has been completed over recent years
- Quiet area nestled by Clifton Springs Golf course – dinner at the golf Club, and walk to the water
- Stone paths and retaining wall beds of native trees provide privacy from the street and neighbours
- Inside, the home feels fresh and new- in greys and white on floating bamboo timber flooring
- Kids can independently play in separate living zone, yet still feel connected to the main family hub
- Formal dining features double pendant lights, with a northerly garden and alfresco outlook
- Open plan kitchen provides a central family hub offering an abundance of storage, and bench space
- Cook in style with Fisher & Paykel appliances including a 90cm oven, range hood and dishwasher
- Full width glazing provides plenty of light and a backyard view to keep an eye on little ones
- Spacious living is amplified further by sliding glass stackers, joining indoor/outdoor flooring as one
- Alfresco perfection- a roofline reaches skyward, to maximise light without disturbing the leafy vista
- Expansive Vic Ash decking meets with soaring Cypress posts in this all season entertaining space
- Let the kids roam free on the fantastic lawn, or relax in peace listening to the breeze in the trees
- The carpeted bedroom wing includes a Master with WIR, and 2nd and 3rd bedrooms with BIRs
- Family bathroom with crisp white cabinetry, freestanding corner bath and in situ shower
- Full sized laundry with storage and direct external access, and separate WC
- Gas ducted heating is toasty in winter, whilst SS A/C and ceiling fans cool throughout summer
- Blockout blinds, and external awnings to west facing bedrooms to keep afternoon heat at bay
- Secure DLUG with side roller door is perfect for tradies, plenty of room for storage
- New fencing, LED downlights, with a fresh coat of paint leaves nothing to do but enjoy
- Just a short drive to schools, boat ramp, surf beaches and coastal towns of the Bellarine
- An easy walk to the foreshore, surrounding coastal tracks, Golf course and parklands
Been looking at building or buying? Compare the space, peace and privacy of this masterfully refurbished and finished home – and relax into an ideal family lifestyle!

Description:
INVEST IN THIS HOME WITH VIEWS
We have this home where the tenants would be extremely disappointed if they had to move. Are you looking to invest in this location? In the last twelve months the property values in this area have increased by 12.5% since November 2017 (source CoreLogic).
It is the time to buy before the market out prices your purse. Living in this area for over 30 years I have seen so many changes for the better. We started with a small supermarket called Ansonâ??s, we have grown to have two Woolworths, an Aldi and a Coles. We have moved from two small medical centres to two large medical centres plus two smaller ones. We have increased from two local state primary schools to four primary and three High schools. Progress is good. With progress comes a good choice of lifestyle. Work, rest and play in this pretty part of the Bellarine Peninsula.
This home has been renovated so well you can sit and enjoy the view. Just a short walk to the waterâ??s edge. With a minimum of 24 hoursâ?? notice we can book an inspection.

Address: 18-24 High Ridge Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Incredible Bay Views And The Privilege Of Space
Set in a quiet lifestyle location renowned for it’s jaw-dropping bay views this magical property is a must see. Comprising approximately 4.23 acres, the most unique asset is the privilege of space. Nestled by picturesque gardens and lawns, the solid mud brick home and large machinery shed, boast panoramic views over Port Phillip Bay and the You Yangs. The potential here is extraordinary!
-Heart of the Bellarine, moments from conveniences in Drysdale, 25’ to Geelong, 90’ to Melbourne
-Stunning bay views include passing ships by day and Geelong City lights by night
-Approximately 5’ walk to protected bayside beaches and parkland
-Earthy characterful home custom built from mud brick and cedar flitches
-Quirky mezzanine design with vast kitchen/living hub below and a parental retreat above
-Also a bright garden room and DLUG with 2 lofty double bedrooms above the garage
-Impressive north facing kitchen/living hub with French windows framing bay and garden views
-Blackwood kitchen with granite benchtops, 900mm freestanding cooker, Miele dishwasher
-Big pantry space and double fridge cavity
-Family-sized dining space under a dramatic vaulted ceiling
-Living zone, with Rinnai Energysaver gas heater and access to the BBQ/spa deck
-Charming bathroom with claw-foot bath and shower sits close to a 4th double BR
-Large laundry with storage room and yard access
-The retreat features a BR with walk-through robe and en suite, living space and study/nursery
-Ducted evaporative AC tailors the climate on this scenic and private level
-BRs 3 and 4 feature vaulted ceilings and beautiful outlooks, and are accessed via the garden room
-A further coat room and study complete this unique design
-Exciting opportunities for renovation/extension (STCA) to further harness the big bay view
-The 24.5x13.5m shed with concrete floor, power and water, ideal for tradespeople
-Ample space to store trade vehicles and equipment
-Over 100,000L of rainwater storage supports the garden
-Gardens feature over 400 roses, rare Wollemi and Bunya pines and many other ornamentals
-Bridge, arbour and deck features are ideal for staging weddings and other large celebrations
-Shelterbelts offer privacy and protection
Space and views like these are rare in an urban setting, almost anywhere else on The Bellarine. We invite you to come along and inspect this hidden gem!
Insights: 18-24 High Ridge Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Space, Lifestyle & Bay Views
This well-appointed double storey residence offers exceptional family accommodation, across a low maintenance ‘blank canvas' block. Entertain in style in the elegant upper-level domain that flows out to a breezy balcony, and treat guests to stunning blue water views across the bay!
- 4 bedroom, dual living townhouse located in a quiet street, on an elevated easy care block
- High ceilings and abundant highlight glazing gift natural light and a sense of space throughout
- Upstairs, open plan living/kitchen/dining connect seamlessly to an open-air balcony with sea views
- Picture windows and highlight glazing wrap the corner of the lounge, for bay glimpses inside
- Naturally toned kitchen is accented by 90cm Westinghouse apps and WIP with endless storage
- Open up the glass stacker doors from meals to the tiled balcony, for a fresh sea breeze within
- Hotel style master suite with highlight glazing, an own hall with generous WIR and private ensuite
- The downstairs zone accommodates guests or children offering a separate and sizeable retreat
- 3 queen sized bedrooms with BIRs share a family bathroom with bath, shower, and separate WC
- The laundry is placed conveniently at the end of the bedroom wing, with direct access to the yard
- Ducted gas heating warm the home in winter, accompanied by a split system A/C to main living
- Low maintenance lawns and garden beds for children and pets, aggregate drive, and alfresco areas
- Weatherboard, vertical cladding and textured architectural brick exteriors provide a modern look
- Roller blinds, upstairs guest powder room, tiled wet areas, carpet to bedrooms and living zones
- DLUG with internal access and rear roller door, and gated side access to for a caravan or boat
- 5mins to shopping centres and a short walk to Clifton Springs boat ramp, Golf Club, and foreshore
- Fabulously central location in the heart of The Bellarine, close to wineries and amazing beaches
If water views, space for family and friends, and a low maintenance block is at the top of your shopping list – you simply must inspect this exceptional lifestyle property!

Description:
Unique Opportunity Calling All Investors!
Clifton Springs has become quite the growth corridor, being very popular amongst investors all wanting a piece of the Bellarine before prices skyrocket.
On offer are 2 townhouses, equipped with fantastic tenants, in a premium Clifton Springs location, well kept, well priced and awaiting your portfolio.
These townhouses are architecturally designed with no expenses spared on the quality fitout, now 6 years old and presenting fantastically.
Split over 2 free flowing levels you will feel right at home in the light filled and airy surroundings. Upon the ground level you will find 2 bedrooms both with built-in robes, main bathroom with shower & bath, powder room and an ample sized laundry room including storage cupboard completes the ground level. The timber staircase will lead you to a light filled first floor where you will find a large master suite with walk-in robe and full ensuite. The designer kitchen with caesarstone benchtops, pantry, gas cooktop and stainless steel appliances overlooking an expansive living/dining area surrounded by windows, bay views and leading onto the balcony.
Features of the townhouses include stone benchtops, bamboo flooring, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, gas ducted heating, split system heating/cooling, roller blinds, separate titles, under stairs storage and additional outdoor storage, double lock up garage with remote entry, internal/external access and exposed aggregate path and driveway with a clean and low maintenance street appeal.
Located in a fantastic part of Clifton Springs only minutes to all amenities, the Bay and what the Bellarine has to offer.
A fantastic opportunity for an investor with:
1/42 rented at $1694.65 PCM and leased until the 17/06/2018
2/42 (long term tenant) leased at $375 PW until the 01/08/2018
Alternatively you can secure a move in date towards the middle of the year.

Description:
SWEEPING WATER AND GOLF COURSE VIEWS!
The Facts:
-Spectacular panoramic bay views; sweeping golf course vistas
-A quality custom build with an architectural flair
-Character filled; cathedral ceilings and polished timber floor boards
-A stunning renovation; kitchen, bathroom, ensuite and as new carpets throughout
-Fully equipped decked alfresco zone set to the rear; excellent storage solutions offered by generous timber bench seats
-Expansive garage facilities (11.2m x 6.7m approx.) and a work shop
-A x8 solar panel system further endorses this property's 'ticks all boxes' profile
-Low maintenance gardens and a number of productive fruit trees.
The Features:
Set right in the heart of the Clifton Springs Golf Club precinct and offering spectacular bay views this property is sure to be stamped 'sizzling hot' within the property market. A commanding double story build with an architectural flair takes full advantage of panoramic water views, the neighbouring rolling green fairways and established tree tops as far as the eye can see. If you desire a property of great character then look no further; the charm of cathedral ceilings and polished timbers floors are complimented by a sharp contemporary renovation. The kitchen serves up a great practical space with clever design features; including custom cabinetry and stainless steel appliances. 2 well-appointed living zones take full advantage of a northerly aspect and are bathed in natural light. 3 bedrooms (master is complete with a walk in robe & modern ensuite) and the 2 additional bedrooms have built in robes. A fully equipped decked alfresco to the rear provides a lovely sheltered space to entertain the friends and family; it is fully powered and timber bench seats offer excellent storage solutions. Low maintenance gardens and various productive fruit trees provide a pleasant outlook and a lifestyle to match. The entire ground level is dedicated to a 11.2m x 6.7m approx garage with dual remote controlled roller doors and an additional work shop (fully powered and lined).
This property simply wants for nothing; a wonderful home for today and an exceptional investment for the future.

Description:
COTTAGE WITH OPTIONS
This neat little cottage in Carawatha Avenue could be just the spot for you. Featuring a tidy kitchen, 2 bedrooms with BIR's and a lounge room with gas heating.
The big draw card of this property is its excellent shedding with 2 adjoining sheds at the rear of the property. The smaller shed measures 4.25 x 6.2 metres and is fitted with power, phone, TV, plumbing and is the perfect man cave. The larger shed is purpose built for the boat/caravan and measures 3.95 x 8.7 metres and is equipped with water and interior drainage to clean your pride and joy. The house is currently tenanted to an excellent tenant on a lease until May this year. There is a fence separating the house from the sheds which the current tenant doesn't have access to.
Never heard of Clifton Springs? Well the secret is out, everything you need to enjoy life, work and play at a reasonable value but you need to be quick to get in before the prices really skyrocket in the last twelve months we have experienced a growth of 5.6% see attached link:
https://www.***/invest/house-in-clifton+springs,+vic+3222
Why not come along to an open for inspection or call to make a private inspection with a minimum of 24 hours' notice.

Description:
Original Charmer Perfect for a Spruce-Up!
A warm vintage feel oozes through this brick home, set on single-level ease with an attractive street presence. The retro features of gently sloped raked ceilings, exposed beams, arch doorways, and vertical timber interior walls, will smarten up superbly with a contemporary upgrade. The neat abode is in excellent condition, comprising of two bedrooms, both with BIR’s, and a central bathroom, with a convenient separate WC. Entry to the home is down the sealed driveway, via the long carport. Stepping into the L-shaped cosy lounge and dining that continues into a wrap around kitchen. From here a rear hallway takes the flow past the bedrooms, bathroom and out the back door via the spacious laundry. The surrounding garden in all aspects is well established, adorned with a beautiful flowering gum at the front, and easy-care ground cover and garden beds. The carport, given its generous length, concrete base and lined ceiling, would convert seamlessly to a decked alfresco entertaining area. Storage is in abundance, with a SLUG, good-size utility shed, and a bonus external storage cupboard. The north-facing yard has a freestanding purpose-built brick fire pit/BBQ, that anchors this outdoor space and invites conversation and cheer with friends. The secure side gate access is granted from the carport. The property’s locale is positioned in a friendly neighbourhood street, and only a 2-minute drive to the Drysdale shopping hub, and Jetty Road. Schools all within easy reach. Come and live in the heart of the Bellarine, with its beautiful natural assets only moments away. First Home Buyers are urged to inspect, investors and downsizers should also consider. Don’t delay this one will not last!
Insights: 17 Aloomba Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A PERFECT HOME TO DELIGHT THE ASTUTE BUYER!
A long verandah frames this well maintained and renovated home, not a thing to do but enjoy living here at no . 59. The open plan living is really like 2 rooms, includes kitchen, meals, living and study........all updated and gleaming, three bedrooms all with BIR'S, central 2 way bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Doors open from the living to private outside undercover paved area , easy to entertain here, path winds to another alfresco area overlooking rear yard as well. Features include dishwasher, pantry, new window furnishings, outdoor blinds, gas heater , garden shed and more . Side drive to double garage with space for freestanding vehicles. As stated a perfect home.

Description:
Spectacular views from a quiet court
Live a private and scenic lifestyle in this 4-bedroom home with spectacular north westerly views over Port Phillip Bay and the You Yangs, and peaceful rural vistas to the south. The quiet, elevated court close to the golf course, boat ramp and bay beaches offers a scenic and leisure-based lifestyle like no other.
The 2-storey floor plan delivers upper and lower living zones, ideal zoning for downsizes and a 2.5 car garage. Live amongst the impressive panorama in the lofty kitchen/living zone. Here, 360 degree views over the You Yangs and bay, capture Geelong’s night lights and golden sunsets as well as local farmland. Multiple accesses join the the sundrenched deck. The spotless kitchen offers quality Kleenmaid appliances and walk-in pantry. The wood fire, split system AC and nearby powder room ensure total comfort and convenience. The master suite, with ensuite and robes, also absorbs the unique views.
Below, find 3 queen-sized bedrooms with robes, main bathroom, separate toilet, laundry and internal garage access. The 2nd living area, with split system, is ideal for children or quiet time. Ducted heating and ceiling fans throughout.
The garage easily houses 2 cars and a trailer. Trades people and greenthumbs will love the large detached shed with concrete floor and workbench. 5000L (approx) tanks service the gardens. A 4kW solar array significantly reduces running costs. 572sqm approx.
Come and see this spectacular location!
Insights: 2/23 Wintersun Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
GET THE FAMILY FEEL
Sometimes you just get a home that you know has been enjoyed and feels like home as soon as you walk in. Well this home is just that, the owners have loved and maintained this place for the next person to make it theirs. Built with family time in mind this home offers undercover veranda directly off the kitchen meals.
Only a short distance to the things you will need for an enjoyable life in this suburb. Get the balance right between work and play. Ride your bike or walk the bike trail, visit the many restaurants and cafes. Enrol the kids into sporting groups of which there are too many to list.
What options do we have for schooling? Well we have State, Christian and Catholic schools at your fingertips. Have I convinced you to move yet? Come and check Clifton Springs out you will be surprised at what you will find. Only a stoneâ??s throw from the golf club and boat ramp and not at all far from the shopping centres.
